week.

Corallyn

messages.messageBody:
I love this... Copied it and tidied it up and going to send it to a few
people who have asked us about homeschooling... Don't suppose they will like
what this says... but if I cared about that I wouldn't be unschooling (LOL)

Dawn F

to tell when reading text, how one means something. :-)
